question.text:
Match the correct term and meaning.
 
Term Meaning
I. Classification A. Study of organisms and their diversities and the relationships between them.
II. Taxonomy B. Process by which anything is grouped into categories based on easily observable characters.
III. Systematics C. Unit of classification
IV. Taxon D. Process of classification.

options.text: <math><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>

<math><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">D</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">V</mi><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mo>-</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"> </mi><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>

solution.text:
Classification is the process by which anything is grouped into categories based on easily observable characters.

Taxonomy is the process of classification.

Taxon is the unit of classification i.e. the category into which each organism is placed.

Systematics is the study of organisms and their diversities and the relationships between them.
